==== localClassesInLoop_ES6.ts (1 errors) ====
    declare function use(a: any);
    
    "use strict"
    var data = [];
    for (let x = 0; x < 2; ++x) {
        class C { }
        data.push(() => C);
             ~~~~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'push' does not exist on type '{}'.
    }
    
    use(data[0]() === data[1]());
